speaker: NATHANIEL
text: Very reverend sport, truly, and done in the

speaker: NATHANIEL

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: The deer was, as you know, sanguis, in

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: blood, ripe as the pomewater, who now hangeth

speaker: HOLOFERNES

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: the heaven, and anon falleth like a crab on the face

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: of terra, the soil, the land, the earth.

text: Truly, Master Holofernes, the epithets are

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: sweetly varied, like a scholar at the least. But, sir, I

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: assure you, it was a buck of the first head.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: Sir Nathaniel, haud credo.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: This is a gift that I have, simple, simple—

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: a foolish extravagant spirit, full of forms,

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: figures, shapes, objects, ideas, apprehensions, motions,

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: revolutions. These are begot in the ventricle

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: of memory, nourished in the womb of pia mater,

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: and delivered upon the mellowing of occasion. But

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: the gift is good in those in whom it is acute, and I

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: am thankful for it.

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: Sir, I praise the Lord for you, and so may

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: my parishioners, for their sons are well tutored by

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: you, and their daughters profit very greatly under

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: you. You are a good member of the

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: commonwealth.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: capable, I will put it to them. But Vir sapis qui pauca

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: loquitur. A soul feminine saluteth us.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: pearl enough for a swine. ’Tis pretty, it is well.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: poesy—caret. Ovidius Naso was the man. And why

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: indeed “Naso,” but for smelling out the odoriferous

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: flowers of fancy, the jerks of invention? Imitari is

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: nothing: so doth the hound his master, the ape his

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: keeper, the tired horse his rider.—But damosella

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: virgin, was this directed to you?

text: Ay, sir, from one Monsieur Berowne, one

speaker: JAQUENETTA
text: of the strange queen’s lords.

               Sir Nathaniel, this

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: Berowne is one of the votaries with the King, and

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: here he hath framed a letter to a sequent of the

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: stranger queen’s: which accidentally, or by the way

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: of progression, hath miscarried.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: Trip and go, my sweet. Deliver this paper into the

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: royal hand of the King. It may concern much. Stay

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: not thy compliment. I forgive thy duty. Adieu.

speaker: JAQUENETTA
text: Good Costard, go with me.—Sir, God

speaker: JAQUENETTA
text: save your life.

speaker: COSTARD
text: Have with thee, my girl.

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: Sir, you have done this in the fear of God

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: very religiously; and, as a certain Father saith—

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: Sir, tell not me of the Father. I do fear

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: colorable colors. But to return to the verses: did

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: they please you, Sir Nathaniel?

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: Marvelous well for the pen.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: I do dine today at the father’s of a certain

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: pupil of mine, where if, before repast, it shall

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: please you to gratify the table with a grace, I will,

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: on my privilege I have with the parents of the

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: foresaid child or pupil, undertake your ben venuto;

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: where I will prove those verses to be very unlearned,

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: neither savoring of poetry, wit, nor invention.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: I beseech your society.

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: And thank you too; for society, saith the

speaker: NATHANIEL
text: text, is the happiness of life.

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: And certes the text most infallibly concludes

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text:
it.
                 
                To
                 
                Dull
                .
               Sir, I do invite you too. You shall

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: not say me nay. Pauca verba. Away! The gentles are

speaker: HOLOFERNES
text: at their game, and we will to our recreation.
